snippet.title: Luigi's Mansion: Beyond Origins - NFG 2021 Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
At long last, I am excited to present to you...
Luigi's Mansion: Beyond Origins - the mod which has seen 6 years of it's making gained an overhaul and will see it's horizons expand beyond the original scope of the Luigi's Mix/Collection project.

Since then, the project has long deviated from an accurate representation of the E3 build. The name has stuck around forever and the project deserved a better depiction of what it aims to be. Now with the liberty to break free from the "beta", as much as it still alludes to it currently, things will eventually change to something completely unexpected. 

With the advances in LM Modding, I hope to make my goals come true and also give the scene a breath of fresh air with Luigi's Mansion: Beyond Origins.

Many thanks to all the people who helped along the way and stayed to follow things move ahead. 

Check out the Nintendo Fan-Games Direct: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PfKRN1Ejbho

Song - "Ice Eyes, Kamoking" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iWWKC6x7qYE
